text: Bɨ Lipay jɨj ak kɨli pel tap day nokom dɨpal. Pen Melkisedek ne Eblaham nop kanɨb nab nop nebeŋ pakak ñɨn ak, Eblaham ne Melkisedek nop tap bɨlok day nokom ñak. Ñɨn anɨb ak, Eblaham ñapay ma tɨkak. Kɨdek pen ñapay tɨkek, tɨkel amɨl apɨl gek, Lipay nop tɨkak. Pen Eblaham ne Melkisedek nop tap day nokom ñak ak, Lipay nop ma tɨkak won ak ñak. Ak nɨm, Lipay ne Melkisedek nop tap day nokom ñeb tek takaw ak, chɨn anɨgɨl gos nɨŋɨd anɨb apun.
